package.description:
A driver for the remotecontrol receiver attached to the can-io-board on TASER's right side. This node publishes values between -1 (left, reverse) and 1.0 (forward, right) with 20Hz on the topic "remotecontrol_values".
Make sure to rotate the "Steering D/R" wheel to the very front of the sender, else the steering amplitude will be too small.
Employs the NET_DEV-variant of the peak-system pcan-dongle driver and the linux can- socket network stack to talk to the CAN-IO-board, to which the rc-receiver is connected.
package.author: Ben Adler, adler@informatik.uni-hamburg.de
